script_text:
Lily,today is the last day of school.Where are you going in
your winter vacation?
I'm going to Harbin with my parents.I don't like cold weather.
I'm afraid of getting a cold.
Oh,you'll be fine.What are you going to do there?
We're going to see ice lanterns and play in the snow.My
uncle's family live there.We're going to visit them.
Are you going to ski?
Yes.I can't ski now,but I'm going to have skiing lessons.
OK,have a nice winter vacation!
You too!I'm going to bring back some sausages for you!I hear
they are famous in Harbin.
Thank you.

engine_raw.gemini_feedback: 学生整体语速平稳，发音清晰度尚可，但存在典型的‘中式英语’发音习惯：一是容易在单词结尾或元音后加入多余的卷舌音（如 fine 读成 frine）；二是习惯性地修改剧本中的虚词（如添加 the 或 to）；三是对缩写词（'m, 'll, 're）的处理不够熟练，容易漏读或拆读。建议加强鼻音 /n/ 的专项练习，并练习缩写词的自然弱读。
engine_raw.detected_transcript: Lily, today is the last day of school. Where are you going to in your winter vacation? I'm going to Harbin with my parents. I don't like cold weather. I'm afraid of getting a cold. Oh, you will be frine. What are you going to do there? I'm going to see the ice lanterns and play in the snow. My uncle's family lives there. We're going to visit them. Are you going to ski? Yes. I can't ski now, but I going to have skiing lessons. OK, have a nice winter vacation! You too! I'm going to bring back some sausages for you! I hear they are famous in Harbin. Thank you.

conflict_details.comment: 请练习缩写词的连读，不要拆开。

conflict_details.got: 识别为 frine，带有明显的卷舌干扰
conflict_details.comment: 舌尖顶住上齿龈发鼻音 /n/，不要让舌头向后卷。
注意看清主语，这里是‘我们’。
多读了一个 the，请保持文本一致性。
注意主谓一致，family 在此处作为整体或成员看，剧本要求是 live。

conflict_details.got: 漏读了 'm，读成了 I going
conflict_details.comment: be going to 结构中，am 不能省略。

integrated_feedback.overall_comment: 同学，你的声音非常有亲和力，朗读的节奏感把握得不错，听起来很自然。但在细节上，你像是一个‘热心的小编辑’，不自觉地给句子加了些词，或者改了主语。最需要注意的是 fine 这个词，你把它读得有点像‘冰霜’的感觉了，记得舌尖要轻轻顶住牙齿后面哦。
specific_suggestions: 练习 fine, line, mine 时，确保舌尖顶住上齿龈，不要卷舌。
朗读 We're going to 时，练习将 We 和 are 缩读成一个音节 /wɪər/。
注意 be going to 结构，I'm 中的 m 音一定要闭嘴发出来。
practice_tips: 对着镜子发 /n/ 音，观察舌尖位置。
录音并回听，专门对比自己是否多读了 'the' 或 'to'。
integrated_feedback.fun_challenge: 试着挑战连续读 5 遍 'Fine wine in the sunshine'，保证每个 n 都不卷舌！

top_errors.description: 在 fine 一词中，鼻音 /n/ 之前出现了多余的卷舌音或元音偏离，听起来像 frine。
top_errors.improvement: 发 /n/ 时，舌尖应紧贴上齿龈，确保气流从鼻腔流出，不要卷舌。

top_errors.description: 将 We're 读成了 I'm，将 you'll 拆读为 you will，并漏读了 I'm 中的 'm。
top_errors.improvement: 注意缩写词的读法，We're 读作 /wɪər/，不要随意更改主语。

top_errors.description: 在 going 后面多加了 to，或在名词前多加了 the。
top_errors.improvement: 严格按照剧本朗读，避免习惯性添加虚词。

words.diagnosis: 识别为 frine，带有明显的卷舌干扰
漏读了 'm，读成了 I going

mistakes.desc: Said '读成了 you will' instead of 'you'll'

mistakes.got: 识别为 frine，带有明显的卷舌干扰
mistakes.desc: Said '识别为 frine，带有明显的卷舌干扰' instead of 'fine'
Said '读成了 the ice lanterns' instead of 'ice lanterns'

mistakes.got: 漏读了 'm，读成了 I going
mistakes.desc: Said '漏读了 'm，读成了 I going' instead of 'I'm'

hesitations.desc: 检测到了一些填充词。尝试用停顿代替它们。
tips: 在想说什么的时候，试着深呼吸而不是发出'嗯'的声音。
尝试放慢语速，给自己更多思考时间。

completeness.title: 完整度分析
completeness.insight: 内容覆盖率: 4% (漏读 78 个关键词)
tips: 尝试更仔细地阅读实词（名词、动词），它们承载了句子的核心含义。
注意不要吞掉像 'a', 'the' 这样的小词，虽然它们不重读，但也是句子的一部分。
